ids.description: A list of event ids in lowercase hex

authors.description: A list of lowercase pubkeys, matching the pubkey of an event

since.description: An integer Unix timestamp in seconds, where events must have created_at >= since

until.description: An integer Unix timestamp in seconds, where events must have created_at <= until

limit.description: The maximum number of events relays SHOULD return in the initial query

^#[a-zA-Z]$.description: A list of tag values, where specific tags (#e, #p) have designated meanings
